Anies Yakin JPO Tanpa Atap di Sudirman Bakal Jadi Spot Selfie
05 Nov 2019, 19:28 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Pencopotan atap di jembatan penyeberangan orang (JPO) di Jalan Jenderal Sudirman merupakan arahan Gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan. Dia yakin nantinya JPO tanpa atap jadi spot selfie baru di Jakarta.
Hal itu disampaikan Anies dalam rapat Rapim Penataan PKL di Trotoar Thamrin-Sudirman dan Pusat Kuliner Thamrin pada 10 pada 23 Oktober 2019. Video rapat itu diunggah di akun YouTube Pemprov DKI.
Dalam rapat itu, Anies memerintahkan Dinas Bina Marga mencopot atap di JPO Sudirman yang menghubungkan antartrotoar. JPO itu tidak menghubungkan pejalan kaki ke halte TransJakarta.
"Apa yang terjadi kalau nanti dibuka? Itu tempat selfie paling sering karena pemandangan gedung di malam hari bagus sekali, sore, siang. Atapnya copot, itu langsung jadi space terbuka," kata Anies saat rapat.
Menurut Anies, eksekusi arahan ini tidak repot. Dia meminta atap JPO tersebut langsung dicopot saja.
"Ini tidak perlu pakai kerumitan, tinggal nyopot atap saja. Nanti sudah copot atapnya, Bapak akan menyaksikan parade pemanfaatan kawasan itu untuk foto-foto," ujarnya.


JPO tanpa atap di Sudirman. (Rengga Sancaya/detikcom)

Anies Believed JPO Without a Roof in Sudirman Will Become a Spot Selfie
05 Nov 2019, 19:28 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - The removal of the roof on the pedestrian crossing bridge (JPO) on Jalan Jenderal Sudirman is the direction of the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan. He is sure that JPO without a roof will become a new selfie spot in Jakarta.
This was conveyed by Anies in a meeting of street vendors on the street vendors arrangement at Sidam Thamrin-Sudirman and Thamrin Culinary Centers on 10 October 23, 2019. The video of the meeting was uploaded on the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government's YouTube account.
During the meeting, Anies ordered the Bina Marga Office to remove the roof at JPO Sudirman, which links between sidewalks. The JPO does not connect pedestrians to TransJakarta stops.
"What happens if you open it later? That place is the most frequent selfie because the view of the building at night is great, afternoon, afternoon. The roof is dislodged, it immediately becomes open space," Anies said during a meeting.
According to Anies, the execution of this directive was not a hassle. He asked that the JPO roof be removed immediately.
"This does not need to use any hassle, all you have to do is remove the roof. You will have removed the roof later, you will witness the parade to use the area for photographs," he said.


JPO without a roof in Sudirman. (Rengga Sancaya / detikcom)
